room_title: Escape room "Boreas' Revenge - An Avalanche Survival Cabin" by Mountain Time Escape Rooms in Breckenridge
review: I went with a bunch of coworkers for team building and it was so much fun! It was my first escape room and it didn't disappoint. It was very interactive and the room had so many cool surprises that led to clues. I highly recommend that you grab a group of friends and try it out!

room_title: Escape room "Boreas' Revenge - An Avalanche Survival Cabin" by Mountain Time Escape Rooms in Breckenridge
review: We went here with young children and our family had an amazing time! I have gone to other escape rooms, but this exceeded any of them by far! The technology and the secret hiding places were awesome. This is a must try experience!

room_title: Escape room "Boreas' Revenge - An Avalanche Survival Cabin" by Mountain Time Escape Rooms in Breckenridge
review: Great room! A perfect fit for Breckenridge. Can't say enough good things about the team (Reba, Larissa, and Luda) for making us all feel welcome and for making the experience such an enjoyable one.

room_title: Escape room "Boreas' Revenge - An Avalanche Survival Cabin" by Mountain Time Escape Rooms in Breckenridge
review: An absolutely wonderful experience, terrific theme, and fantastic direction/accommodations by the owners. This is unlike any other game rooms I've played elsewhere across the US - highest of recommendations!

room_title: Escape room "Boreas' Revenge - An Avalanche Survival Cabin" by Mountain Time Escape Rooms in Breckenridge
review: Our family of six escaped the cabin before the avalanche cut us off from rescues! A great original escape room created by the owners. Friendly staff set us up for a great escape experience. Fantastic activity when you visit Breckenridge. Easy stop on the shuttle route and free bus.
